home_about_content: Trang Binh is a manufacturer of Sodium Silicate in the form of Glass and Liquid. Over the years, the company has continuously expanded its product portfolio and is now supplying chemical materials to both domestic and international companies across various industries in increasingly larger quantities.
home_product_content: We are a leading manufacturer of sodium silicate in Vietnam, with nearly two decades of experience. Our expertise and knowledge have made us leaders in this field.
home_quatity_content1: We use modern machinery and equipment in our production process, with a strong commitment and focus on consistently producing the highest-quality products to enhance customer satisfaction. Trang Binh believes in never compromising on quality and always staying ahead in the race for modern technology. We have an advanced laboratory staffed with specialized engineers to ensure the quality of all products meets the specific criteria required by our customers.
home_quatity_content2: We are committed to protect the health and safety of our employees and everybody involved in our activitie.
home_studies_content1: SODIUM SILICATE MARKET ANALYSIS, MARKET SIZE, APPLICATION ANALYSIS, REGIONAL OUTLOOK, COMPETITIVE STRATEGIES AND FORECASTS, 2014 TO 2020
home_studies_content2: Global sodium silicate market is expected to experience growth in coming years owing to its increasing application in textile, cardboard, and paint industries. Growth in textile industry is expected to drive the sodium silicate market over the forecast period. High paints & coatings demand is expected to have a positive impact on global sodium silicate market. Concrete treated with sodium silicate solution helps to significantly reduce porosity in most masonry products such as concrete, stucco, plasters. Increasing infrastructure spending globally is expected to drive sodium silicate market. Sodium silicate is extensively used as filler for elastomers in automotive tires.
about_content_about: Trang Binh is a factory specializing in the production of Sodium Silicate in the form of Glass and Liquid. Over the years, the company has continuously expanded its product portfolio and is now supplying chemical materials to companies across various industries, both domestically and internationally.
about_mission_content: Trang Binh Silicate aims to become a leading manufacturer of Silicate and refined products derived from Silicate in both domestic and international markets.
about_vision_content: With the desire to create a high-quality Silicate supply, competitive prices, and clear origin, Trang Binh Silicate is increasingly asserting its position in the market of building materials, ceramics, tiles, detergents, casting molds, and more, with an annual production output of over 60,000 tons. Constantly striving, we are eager to build a reliable and reputable relationship with our valued Customers and Partners to accompany sustainable development.
about_values_content: To attain a global leadership position in manufacture OF OUR PRODUCTS.
about_quality_content: We use modern machinery and equipment in the production process, ensuring the highest quality products to enhance customer satisfaction.
about_human_content: Trang Binh represents a culture of total quality in areas such as people, products, services, workplace safety, energy, and the environment. The company is ready to train its workforce at all levels, from extraction to production to marketing.
about_friendly_content: Air and wastewater quality are consistently maintained within standard limits. The company has installed modern equipment such as electrostatic separators and bag air filters to ensure air and wastewater quality consistently meets requirements in a stable and long-term manner.
about_Certificates_content1: Trang Binh has been established on hardworking and enterprising people with a view to supply the genuine & quality products. Trang Binh has won the trust and loyalty from its buyers and distributors.
about_Certificates_content2: After many years of innovation and improvement, Trang Binh establishes a whole complete and large production capacity. In recent years, its products are awarded to INDIA Famous Brand! Meanwhile, Sepal Ceramic has passed the Quality Management System Certification of ISO 9001:2015.

about_contact_content: We believe in long term relationship with our clients.
product_liquid_content1: We offer sodium silicate in liquid form for specific industrial application where the liquid property of the chemical is highly effective. We manufacture high quality silicates that are produced to match our customerâ€™s expectations. For special requirements, we customize the liquid so that it can be integrated with highest efficacy with the products of our clients.
product_liquid_content2: We produce various types of liquid sodium silicate according to customer requirements and provide consultation to help customers improve quality and economic efficiency when using our products.
product_liquid_content3: Sodium Silicate Liquid is produced by dissolving silicate solids with water or by hydrothermal process which is produced by reacting caustic lye and fine crystalline silica in autoclaves under intense pressure.
